ygData.subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Re: 21st lvl
ygData.msgSnippet: I agree, later on in life (lvl 51) with theft of thought, i can maintain more then 6 mobs and still end up Full mana at the end of a fight if there are any
ygData.messageBody:
I agree, later on in life (lvl 51) with theft of thought, i can maintain
more then 6 mobs and still end up Full mana at the end of a fight if there
are any casters i've mezzed.

And like he said casters aren't always around :o(
so a nice nuke in the end of a fight helps against the stupid "gate" spell
mobs cast now :o(, if well timed

nice name Sandoz, lol didn't you get bought out?
>
>Sandoz Pharmacueticals
>42nd Enchanter of Torvonnilous
>Proud officer of Requiem Despair
>
>
